alert.note: Alert for Defiance; Paulding; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 8:58AM EDT until July 23 at 9:15AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 AM EDT FOR SOUTHERN ALLEN...NORTHEASTERN WELLS...NORTHERN ADAMS...SOUTH CENTRAL DEFIANCE...PAULDING AND NORTHWESTERN VAN WERT COUNTIES... At 858 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Payne to 9 miles south of Fort Wayne to near Ossian, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fort Wayne, Defiance, New Haven, Van Wert, Decatur, Ossian, Paulding, Monroeville, Payne, Convoy, Middletown, Middlebury, Preble, Zanesville, Dixon, Grover Hill, Uniondale, Scott, Melrose and Haviland. This includes the following highways... Interstate 469 between mile markers 0 and 20. Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 296 and 300. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
